name: EXTRAPOWER GIANT FIST
description:
Exciting side-scrolling action

Hit and push enemies swarming with one fist,
An exciting side-scrolling action game!
Enemy attacks are guarded and no damage!
Projectiles such as arrows and bullets can be caught and thrown back.

The graphics, BGM, and game system are all original.

Live and live broadcasts are welcome. No prior contact is required.
